basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/Proofpoint%20On%20demand%28POD%29%20Email%20Security/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The [Proofpoint on Demand Email Security](https://www.proofpoint.com/us/products/email-security-and-protection/email-protection) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Proofpoint on Demand Email Protection data and activity logs for monitoring email activity, events and threats in your organization. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Azure Monitor HTTP Data Collector API](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/data-collector-api) b. [Azure Functions](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/functions/#overview) **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 1, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 10 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for Proofpoint On demand(POD) Email Security. You can get Proofpoint On demand(POD) Email Security custom log data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

options.text: This solution installs workbook(s) to help you gain insights into the telemetry collected in Microsoft Sentinel. After installing the solution, start using the workbook in Manage solution view.

elements.name: workbook1
elements.label: Proofpoint On-Demand Email Security

options.text: Gain insights into your Proofpoint on Demand Email Security activities, including maillog and messages data. The Workbook provides users with an executive dashboard showing the reporting capabilities, message traceability and monitoring.
This solution installs the following analytic rule templates. After installing the solution, create and enable analytic rules in Manage solution view.

elements.name: analytic1
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Binary file in attachment

options.text: Detects when email received with binary file as attachment.

elements.name: analytic2
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Possible data exfiltration to private email

options.text: Detects when sender sent email to the non-corporate domain and recipient's username is the same as sender's username.

elements.name: analytic3
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - High risk message not discarded

options.text: Detects when email with high risk score was not rejected or discarded by filters.

elements.name: analytic4
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Multiple archived attachments to the same recipient

options.text: Detects when multiple emails where sent to the same recipient with large archived attachments.

elements.name: analytic5
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Multiple large emails to the same recipient

options.text: Detects when multiple emails with large size where sent to the same recipient.

elements.name: analytic6
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Multiple protected emails to unknown recipient

options.text: Detects when multiple protected messages where sent to early not seen recipient.

elements.name: analytic7
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Suspicious attachment

options.text: Detects when email contains suspicious attachment (file type).

elements.name: analytic8
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Weak ciphers

options.text: Detects when weak TLS ciphers are used.

elements.name: analytic9
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Email sender in TI list

options.text: Email sender in TI list.

elements.name: analytic10
elements.label: ProofpointPOD - Email sender IP in TI list

options.text: Email sender IP in TI list.
